-=surf_Qlimax_Q=-

This is a fixed version of surf_Qlimax. A lot of things have been fixed or have been improved:

-The tesla game in jail works properly again.
-Lightning on stage 2, 3 and 4 have been improved.
- ''and theres a texture glitch for me on a part of the floor in braves level.'' - has been fixed.
-More arrows have been added on stage 4 to make the route of that stage more clearly.
-The carpet at the end of stage 5 now looks like it was supposed to.
-''I get "buffer overflow in net message" consistantly when I walk into the first level'' - MIGHT be fixed.
-An unnecessary ramp on stage 5 has been removed.
-Stage 1 is now easier because it was first harder than stage 2.
-A timer has been added on the last part of Lody's stage so you can also see how much time is left on that part of the map.
-You can now wait at the teleporter before the end so when you finish it you can still allow people to continue surfing.


surf_Qlimax is a collaborative skill surf map. It has 6 stages. You have 6 minutes to complete the map. If the timer runs out before anyone was able to finish, everybody will be teleported to an ice skate jail with 1 HP. (The moment you lose 99 hp can be bugged, if that is the case then contact me immediatly.)
In the middle of this ice skate room you can see a beam. Skate right through it and you will receive flashbang grenades. With this way you can get some flashkills!

When someone did complete the map, everybody will be teleported to another jail. The player that won can now select between 3 buttons. One button offers you kills by killing the other people with a gun, another button will start a survival game and the last one will kill the other people without you getting kills. The details of these effects will be for you to discover.

The stages and creators:

Spawn: Helix
Stage 1: Helix
Stage 2: Juice
Stage 3: Fox
Stage 4: Bravesurf
Stage 5: Bala the Shark
Stage 6: Lody Blokady
Jail 1: Helix
Jail 2: Helix

The map is designed for 66 tick and noblock is required to play this map properly.

So this is surf_pyrism

It's awful hard.

But awful fun.

Good luck.











Simple enough map, 2 stages, both like short linears. Featuring anti-multiboosts :D

Level 1 is difficult in a few parts, but nothing drastic. Level 2 however is for sure tier 6. Don't judge the map until you play it and actually give it a solid go! Don't just take 2 shots, say FUCK THIS and give up. It's hard, but it is enjoyable.



Any and all constructive criticism is welcome, <3

Thanks to everyone who helped.

Don't ever expect a video. Period.

Original map idea : surf_pyramidduel made by YDN_oblivion

The map looks very similar to the original, but everything have been remade due to some inconsistency on the original brushwork.

Hi there this is a new Mapcreation from Smoker and me! I noticed that I can only brush shit but im very good with Entities and stuff. Smoker is the other way. He can brush good and fast but dont know Entities. So we decided that he makes the map and I do the effects and entities. So the idea and layout came completely from smoker. When he gave me the vmf and I opened it in Hammer I just could think of one thing: Ultimate Destruction! So I first fixed some minor bugs and then the Ideas came in. I first thought of just making a big nuke explosion but that was not enough for me. After 12 more ideas of destruction I came up with my last and best Idea. Theres a platform that is very hard to reach with a button. Once the button is pressed the terror begins: The sky changes and you get teleported to savety and can whatch what happens.First some lasers come from the pyramide and the pyramide opens up. Then you see Portals opening in the sky. A big beam comes from the middle Portal and then there is the BIG BOOOOM! U can survive the explosion but even if you manage to survive it, you will get killed by the lasers which come from the middle of the ex-pyramide. Well..thats the whole effect...you can see it in screens 2-5 step-by-step Now to the map itself: It was inspired by two maps: surf_pyramideduell2 and scoutznknivez You start with a scout and a knive. the spawn looks like this: You will have to gain speed at the accelerators to get to multiple platforms to snipe and kill. As I mentioned: It is very hard to get to the highest platform with the button. Its either you dont make it, you make it, or you fly so high that u die when you land! There are 32 spawnpoints. Oh and the explosion lags on low-end computers! On my friends PC the fps dropped from 134 fps to 15-30 fps :P But dont worry. You have to train much to get to the button :P Now go and enjoy this map! Oh and dont mind the red lines in Console! Everything is fine and working as it should! EDIT: I forgot to mention: Because it was built to work under sv_airaccelerate 1000 and sv_gravity 750 it forces those cmd's on round start. EDIT2: Moved kill button up! EDIT3: Fixed a major bug! EDIT4: Reduced the lag...well reduced the time of the lag.. The shockwaves are causing the lag. But now every player will die (except the one who pressed the button) cuz of the explosion. Removed the fps-heavy smoke and all that reduced the size of the map to 4 mb Have Fun!

Hey what is up! Finally, after 3 months of hard work I present surf_pure!
This map is a 7 stage surf map, started by me. I thought of the idea from using 
the textures I used on stage 9 in my previous map, surf_elixor. This map has gone	
through some shit lawl, starting out as a linear, i made the spawn and made stage
one and decided to make it stage one for a new surf map, which was going to be called
surf_amped, but I decided not to use that, too used. So, I decided what i was going	
to do was make 3 stages, spawn, and jail, and then get someone else (originally Razer)
to make 3 more stages, making a 6 stage map. I made 3, he made 2 (ran out of time) 
and so I decided to ask around. Unfortunatly, no one would make 3 stages...so I decided
to have others help. I deleted one of my stages, and let others join in. I later made a	
new spawn, which makes it so where people see us who made it in the beginning, lawl.
So I made that, got an ass-load of errors, then fixed them, and got some stuff ready, and
wa-la. Surf_pure. Jail is IceSkate, for all who don't know how to iceskate, i suggest you 
learn. Play mah map ploX!!!

-[F]ox



Video by Miggo13, thank you for the advertisement man!!!

Welcome to surf_prius!

First off, this map is recommended for 33 tick!  If this map is hosted on a 66 tick server, you will over-shoot the ramps.  No fun.

There are three sections of surf and a jail.  Some are hard, some are not.  If you don't have a considerable amount of surfing skill, do not, I repeat, do not play this map.  You will get frustrated easily for you will not make it very far.

Enjoy.

(Make sure sv_airaccelerate 100 is on)

Have Fun :)

Surf_Prime_Time_R3vamp by -ZaLoS- Find the original at: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/60559 A short list of most of the changes, however not all of them:
  • Raised Spawn - making it a surf down not up
  • Reverse the shotguns and nades at spawn - A limited number of shotties ( 8 ) in order to limit initial combat
  • Reduce bottlenecking to stage 2 with more teleports in and a bigger path at the start of stage 2
  • Better, more fun ramps in stage 3, better boxing
  • Separation of stage 3 and jail for better fps in jail.
  • A hidden teleport in stage one that skips you to stage 3
  • Weapon removal on new round along with automatically adding armor to increase survivability
  • An auto-free jail on a timed interval (30 secs/40 secs dm version)
  • Added ladder to top of jail so people can get back out to the very top.
  • Removal of the boarder on stage one big ramp to stop people sticking to the ramp
  • Stronger Pushes on stage one
  • Stage 2 spinning teleport to start moved to after you get a deg/scout, also not spinning
  • End of stage 2 will have a more obvious weapon pick-up area with more to choose from
  • More secrets
  • More Rewarding Jail room secret
  • Bombs added to the end of stage two (not included in dm version)
  • and more, too much to list here
Original Summary of map: Stage 1: An arena style surf. Circle endlessly if you like, killing as you go. Stage 2: A linear surf. This is intended to allow you to get some on the ramp kills or some sniper shots. Use the spining circle to circle back and try to get some more ramp kills. Stage 3: This stage is a short surf with the jail and bombsite as the main focus. !: Pro This download also includes the dm version of the map. This map was not compiled in hdr. Special thanks to intox. cLutch for hosting the beta and to the beta testers! Additional thanks to www.solidsurf.info for feed back on the map and help tips as well www.intoxgaming.com short video preview of major map changes:
